document.full_text: munich 2018 winter games bid leaders were delighted with their final presentation to the international olympic committee (ioc) before the july vote as france's annecy was seen making up ground.
document.title: munich happy with pitch, annecy catches up
lines_and_colors: munich 2018 winter games bid leaders were delighted with their final presentation to the international olympic committee (ioc) before the july vote as france's annecy was seen making up ground.
